title: Fight Club
summary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

title: Se7en
summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: Inglourious Basterds
summary: In Nazi-occupied France, a group of Jewish-American soldiers plot to assassinate Nazi leaders.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
summary: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
summary: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with bizarre consequences.

title: Ocean's Eleven
summary: A stylish heist film where Danny Ocean and his crew plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

title: Ocean's Twelve
summary: The crew reunites for another heist across Europe, facing increased challenges and rival teams.

title: Ocean's Thirteen
summary: Danny Ocean and his team embark on a mission to avenge a friend's betrayal with a high-stakes casino heist.

title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
summary: A bored married couple discover they are both secret assassins, leading to explosive encounters.

title: Troy
summary: An epic retelling of the Trojan War, focusing on the heroics of Achilles and the fate of Troy.

title: 12 Monkeys
summary: A convict is sent back in time to stop a deadly plague, unraveling a web of conspiracy.

title: World War Z
summary: A former UN investigator travels the world to stop a zombie pandemic threatening humanity.

title: Killing Them Softly
summary: A mob enforcer investigates a heist that disrupts the delicate balance of organized crime.

title: By the Sea
summary: A couple retreats to a French seaside resort, exploring their troubled relationship amidst isolation.

title: Bullet Train
summary: Five assassins find themselves on a high-speed train with interconnected missions and deadly consequences.
